metadata.name: SHARI 2 #1
metadata.description: This collection is the 2nd in a series of NFT projects celebrating the 4th anniversary of the career of mera takeru, a pioneer of crypto art in Japan. For this project, I have collaborated with 5 of Japan's leading artists in a variety of styles to create PFPs of high quality and wide-ranging artistry. A total of 2,222 skulls with 52 different Kanjis and 44 diverse art combinations were created.
